meanings.definition: A structure usually consisting of parallel colonnades supporting an open roof of girders and cross rafters.
meanings.sent1: The pergolas in the garden provided shade during hot days.
meanings.sent2: We sat under the pergolas in the park, enjoying the cool breeze.
meanings.sent3: The vines on the pergolas seemed to be playing a game of tag with the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The pergolas stood like guardians, protecting the pathway beneath.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the pergolas made them a stunning feature of the landscape.

meanings.definition: A structure of this type used as a trellis for climbing plants.
meanings.sent1: The roses climbed gracefully on the pergolas, adding a touch of beauty to the backyard.
meanings.sent2: The grapevines on the pergolas were heavy with ripe fruit.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels seemed to think the pergolas were a jungle gym made just for them.
meanings.sent4: The pergolas embraced the vines like old friends, supporting their growth.
meanings.sent5: The fragrant flowers blooming on the pergolas attracted bees and butterflies alike.
